Title: Downr
Description: Downr is a super simple UI which forces the computer to shutdown after a certain time of the day. Included is a .ADMX and a .ADML file for controlling Downr through group policies.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Downr is a super simple UI which forces the computer to shutdown after a certain time of the day. Included is a .ADMX and a .ADML file for controlling Downr through group policies.
